verses.verse: At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H29>Abijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> fell <S%H2470>sick<s%>.

And <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, I pray <S%H8138>you<s%>, and disguise <S%H3045>yourself<s%>, that you be not known to be the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>; and <S%H1980>get<s%> you to <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>: <S%H281>behold<s%>, there is Ahijah the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, which <S%H1696>told<s%> me that I should be <S%H4428>king<s%> over this <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H3947>take<s%> with <S%H3027>you<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%>, and <S%H5350>cakes<s%>, and a <S%H1228>jar<s%> of <S%H1706>honey<s%>, and <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H5046>him<s%>: he shall tell you what shall become of the <S%H5288>child<s%>.

And <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>, and <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah<s%>. But <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%>; for his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were <S%H6965>set<s%> by reason of his <S%H7869>age<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H281>Ahijah<s%>, <S%H802>Behold<s%>, the wife of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H1875>ask<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%> of you for her <S%H1121>son<s%>; for he is <S%H2470>sick<s%>: <S%H2090>thus<s%> and thus shall you <S%H1696>say<s%> unto <S%H935>her<s%>: for it shall be, when she comes in, that she shall pretend herself to be another <S%H5234>woman<s%>.

And it was <S%H281>so<s%>, when Ahijah <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of her <S%H7272>feet<s%>, as she came <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%>, that he <S%H559>said<s%>, Come <S%H935>in<s%>, you <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>; why pretend you yourself to be <S%H5234>another<s%>? for I am <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you with heavy <S%H7186>news<s%>.

<S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Forasmuch <S%H3282>as<s%> I <S%H7311>exalted<s%> you from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

And <S%H7167>tore<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H7167>away<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it <S%H5650>you<s%>: and yet you have not been as my servant <S%H1732>David<s%>, who <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and who <S%H1980>followed<s%> me with all his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, to <S%H6213>do<s%> that only which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>;

But have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> above all that were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3212>you<s%>: for you have gone and <S%H6213>made<s%> you <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and molten <S%H4541>images<s%>, to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>, and have <S%H7993>cast<s%> me <S%H310>behind<s%> your <S%H1458>back<s%>:

<S%H935>Therefore<s%>, behold, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> him that <S%H8366>urinates<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and him that is shut <S%H6113>up<s%> and <S%H5800>left<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will take <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H310>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, as a man takes <S%H1197>away<s%> <S%H1557>dung<s%>, until it be all <S%H8552>gone<s%>.

Him that <S%H4191>dies<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>; and him that <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

<S%H6965>Arise<s%> you <S%H3212>therefore<s%>, get you to your own <S%H1004>house<s%>: and when your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, the <S%H3206>child<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H5594>mourn<s%> for <S%H6912>him<s%>, and bury <S%H3379>him<s%>: for he only of Jeroboam shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave<s%>, because in him there is <S%H4672>found<s%> some <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> toward the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall raise him <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>: but what? even now.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, as a <S%H7070>reed<s%> is <S%H5110>shaken<s%> in the <S%H4325>water<s%>, and he shall root <S%H5428>up<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H127>land<s%>, which he <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and shall <S%H2219>scatter<s%> them <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>, because they have <S%H6213>made<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%>, provoking the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>up<s%> <S%H1558>because<s%> of the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, who did <S%H2398>sin<s%>, and who made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>.

And <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>: and when she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>door<s%>, the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>;

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3478>him<s%>; and all Israel <S%H5594>mourned<s%> for <S%H1697>him<s%>, according to the word of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>.

And the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, how he <S%H3898>warred<s%>, and how he <S%H4427>reigned<s%>, <S%H3789>behold<s%>, they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3117>days<s%> which <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and he <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.

And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>. <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did <S%H977>choose<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H517>there<s%>. And his mother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5279>Naamah<s%> an <S%H5985>Ammonitess<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and they provoked him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with their <S%H2403>sins<s%> which they had <S%H2398>committed<s%>, above all that their <S%H1>fathers<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%>.

For they also <S%H1129>built<s%> them high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and <S%H4676>images<s%>, and <S%H842>groves<s%>, on every <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

And there were also <S%H6945>sodomites<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: and they <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, that <S%H7895>Shishak<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>:

And he took <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>; he even took <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H3947>all<s%>: and he took away all the <S%H4043>shields<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> in their stead <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4043>shields<s%>, and <S%H6485>committed<s%> them unto the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H7323>guard<s%>, which <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And it was <S%H1767>so<s%>, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that the <S%H7323>guard<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>, and brought them back into the <S%H7323>guard<s%> <S%H8372>chamber<s%>.

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, and all that he <S%H6213>did<s%>, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>?
And there was <S%H4421>war<s%> between <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> all their <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5279>Naamah<s%> an <S%H5985>Ammonitess<s%>. And <S%H38>Abijam<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>stead<s%>.
